body:
Originally reported by eng60340 in issue 159 :

Add comments to deck ? (i.e. personal deck rating, etc)
author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
title: Make it possible to add comments to a deck

comments.body:
That's a great suggestion.

It would also allow for people who submit decks to give players an idea on how the deck should be played.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Storing comments in the .dec file seems easy enough but we have to decide on where to show this information. An option I can think of is to put a text area in the deck statistics panel. Although a comment does not really belong there, I rather don't want to add a whole new panel.

Another thing worth looking at is a way to customize JFileChooser. It would be great to show the comments when browsing decks.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision f6013cc40fa2 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Thanks again for your suggestion.

There's now a way to save a description to a deck. It's shown on the 'Deck View' screen ( https://code.google.com/p/magarena/wiki/UIDeckView ), above the statistics.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body: Revision d8d5652c579c added a custom JFileChooser that shows the description when browsing decks.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
